Posts.EditableText: I put an object into a room. E.g telephone. I leave the room and come back and then there are 2 telephones. It copied itself somehow. If you examine both of them it says the same thing. Why is that?
Posts.HTML: I put an object into a room. E.g telephone. I leave the room and come back and then there are 2 telephones. It copied itself somehow. If you examine both of them it says the same thing. Why is that?

Posts.EditableText: perhaps your code would be of help.
Posts.HTML: perhaps your code would be of help.

Posts.EditableText: Sounds like you've put a "clone object" into the enter room part of the room property window in QDK. Email the file to old486whizz@hotmail.com and I'll check it out ASAP.
Posts.HTML:
Sounds like you've put a "clone object" into the enter room part of the room property window in QDK.

Email the file to old486whizz@hotmail.com and I'll check it out ASAP.

Posts.EditableText: I figured it out. What I did is I put create object in that room. So every time I go there it creates the same object again. Thanks for your help anyway.
Posts.HTML: I figured it out. What I did is I put create object in that room. So every time I go there it creates the same object again. Thanks for your help anyway.
